To the chief Musician<S>5329</S> for the sons<S>1121</S> of Korah<S>7141</S>, A Song<S>7892</S> upon Alamoth<S>5961</S>. God<S>430</S> is our refuge<S>4268</S> and strength<S>5797</S>, a very<S>3966</S> present<S>4672</S> help<S>5833</S> in trouble<S>6869</S>. <sup>for: or, of</sup>
Therefore will not we fear<S>3372</S>, though the earth<S>776</S> be removed<S>4171</S>, and though the mountains<S>2022</S> be carried<S>4131</S> into the midst<S>3820</S> of the sea<S>3220</S>; <sup>midst: Heb. heart of the seas</sup>
Though the waters<S>4325</S> thereof roar<S>1993</S> and be troubled<S>2560</S>, though the mountains<S>2022</S> shake<S>7493</S> with the swelling<S>1346</S> thereof. Selah<S>5542</S>.
There is a river<S>5104</S>, the streams<S>6388</S> whereof shall make glad<S>8055</S> the city<S>5892</S> of God<S>430</S>, the holy<S>6918</S> place of the tabernacles<S>4908</S> of the most High<S>5945</S>.
God<S>430</S> is in the midst<S>7130</S> of her; she shall not be moved<S>4131</S>: God<S>430</S> shall help<S>5826</S> her, and that right<S>6437</S> early<S>1242</S>. <sup>and: Heb. when the morning appeareth</sup>
The heathen<S>1471</S> raged<S>1993</S>, the kingdoms<S>4467</S> were moved<S>4131</S>: he uttered<S>5414</S> his voice<S>6963</S>, the earth<S>776</S> melted<S>4127</S>.
The LORD<S>3068</S> of hosts<S>6635</S> is with us; the God<S>430</S> of Jacob<S>3290</S> is our refuge<S>4869</S>. Selah<S>5542</S>. <sup>our: Heb. an high place for us</sup>
Come<S>3212</S>, behold<S>2372</S> the works<S>4659</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>, what desolations<S>8047</S> he hath made<S>7760</S> in the earth<S>776</S>.
He maketh wars<S>4421</S> to cease<S>7673</S> unto the end<S>7097</S> of the earth<S>776</S>; he breaketh<S>7665</S> the bow<S>7198</S>, and cutteth<S>7112</S> the spear<S>2595</S> in sunder<S>7112</S>; he burneth<S>8313</S> the chariot<S>5699</S> in the fire<S>784</S>.
Be still<S>7503</S>, and know<S>3045</S> that I am God<S>430</S>: I will be exalted<S>7311</S> among the heathen<S>1471</S>, I will be exalted<S>7311</S> in the earth<S>776</S>.
The LORD<S>3068</S> of hosts<S>6635</S> is with us; the God<S>430</S> of Jacob<S>3290</S> is our refuge<S>4869</S>. Selah<S>5542</S>.
